name: Will Pete Eat It?
description:
Will Pete Eat It?

Will Pete Eat It is a casual fetch quest simulator procedural survival game where you can eat anything although you really shouldn't. Pick up items and add them to your pot. When you think you meal is edible, it is time to consume!

Pete wants to eat a rolling pin instead of this giant pizza, we think this is a bad idea!

Pete now wants to eat a cake, this might not kill him.

Controls

Space - Pickup Items / Place Items in Pot

E - Consume Pot Contents.

ESC - Pause/Unpause menu

Made by
Michael Christie
James Camber
Sam Stubbings

Music by

John L French

Art from kenny.nl
